resources.string: We\'re sorry, but you cannot order at this time.
Please, try again during opening hours.
The code you tried to scan was not recognised, please try to scan again or enter the code manually
Scan or enter a code to get started
The code or table number you have entered was not recognised. Try entering the code again or use your camera to scan the code

We just serve you a big \'ol bowl \'o fish. Pretty much does what it ways on the tin. What kind of fish, you ask? A mixture of cooked and raw scraps we swooped off our kitchen floor and put into a bowl for you to enjoy.
You can now see your order in the order history
